nodes.title: Enhance Your Videos With These Canva Tips
nodes.description: Create eye-catching videos with these Canva tips! From editing your content to creating stylish video thumbnails, we've got you covered!
nodes.coverAlt: Enhance Your Videos With These Canva Tips

nodes.title: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry
nodes.description: We have summarised news from the translation technology industry that covers the latest advancements in methods to preserve a dying language and break language barriers.
nodes.coverAlt: Latest News In The Translation Technology Industry

nodes.title: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021
nodes.description: Want to create the next viral short video with your Android phone? Check out these 8 short video apps to help make your dreams come true!
nodes.coverAlt: The 8 Best Short Video Apps for Android 2021

nodes.title: 9 of IOS Top Video Editing Apps 2021
nodes.description: Want to know what apps you can use to make your soon-to-be viral videos? Check out these top 9 iOS apps that can up your video editing skills!
nodes.coverAlt: 9 iOS Top Video Editing Apps 2021

nodes.title: The Importance Of Learning A Foreign Language
nodes.description: Ever wondered why learning a foreign language is so important? Find out here as we discuss the 3 main importances of learning a foreign language
nodes.coverAlt: The Importance Of Learning A Foreign Language

nodes.title: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language
nodes.description:
I remember that we got punished as students for speaking our mother tongue
  which was tagged 'vernacular' at school. That affected the growth of our indigenous
  languages greatly. Read about one woman's journey to save her mother tongue, Igbo
nodes.coverAlt: One Igbo Woman Trying To Save Her Language

nodes.title: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI
nodes.description:
The way younger users consumer video content is evolving and marketers
  need to evolve too. In this post we look at how video content consumption is changing
  and where AI can improve your processes.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Reach Gen Z Using AI

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
nodes.description:
A hearing impaired couple is suing a hospital for not providing disability
  friendly facilities. Is this justified? How can you avoid being sued for not meeting
  accessibility requirements?
nodes.coverAlt: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued

nodes.title: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly
nodes.description:
We introduce the Quick Transcribe functionality. Here we have taken everything
  we learnt about how clients use our app and put it into a single workflow for fast,
  efficient transcription and translation.
nodes.coverAlt: Quick Transcribe: For When You Need To Get Transcription Done Quickly

nodes.title: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves
nodes.description:
Facebook's AI got in trouble this week for translating Chinese President
  Xi Jinping name as Mr Shithole. How to avoid AI disasters. Also, your co-workers
  are likely to trust a robot boss over a human one according to Oracle, and this
  might be a good thing.
nodes.coverAlt: Mr Sh*thole: What To Do When Your AI Misbehaves

nodes.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
nodes.description:
In this article we're looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different
  voices available. We look at what Male and Female Arabic AI's sound like. Have a
  listen!
nodes.coverAlt: What Arabic Voices are Available?

nodes.title: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency
nodes.description:
We achieved a 3x increase in our transcription efficiency using AI. Read
  on to find out how we did this, and what we learnt from changing our procedure.
nodes.coverAlt: 3x Increase In Transcription Efficiency

nodes.title: An Old Language Is Young Again...
nodes.description:
Today we look at work in bringing back Tifinagh, the script used to write
  the Amazigh (or Berber) languages of North Africa. We also look at what Comcast
  is doing to provide support in sign language, and why you should invest in people
  when picking a transcription, translation or dubbing commercial partner.
nodes.coverAlt: An Old Language Is young Again...

nodes.coverAlt: Visual Guides: How To Manage Your Account
